newsitem.title: USA: Midday CSCE world sugar off after fund selling.
newsitem.headline: Midday CSCE world sugar off after fund selling.

text.p: CSCE world sugar was off at midday in the wake of technical-based fund selling, but rebounded slightly.
"The commission houses triggered some sell stops at 11.60-11.62 (in the October contract)," one floor trader said. "It looked like the funds were behind it."
He added that commercial traders were scale-up buyers later in the session.
At 1241 EDT, October sugar was off 0.10 cent at 11.58 cents a lb, traded 11.50 to 11.76 cents.
Volume on both sides of the Atlantic was quiet.
